(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Sio) (NNP Bak))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADVP (RB actually))
      (NP (RB quite) (DT a) (JJ simple) (NN thing))
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB do)
            (SBAR
              (ADVP (IN at) (NN home))
              (RB as)
              (FRAG
                (VP (VBN compared)
                  (S
                    (VP (TO to)
                      (VP (VB say)))))))))))
    (, ,)))


nn(Bak-2, Sio-1)
nsubj(thing-8, Bak-2)
cop(thing-8, is-3)
advmod(thing-8, actually-4)
advmod(thing-8, quite-5)
det(thing-8, a-6)
amod(thing-8, simple-7)
root(ROOT-0, thing-8)
aux(do-10, to-9)
xcomp(thing-8, do-10)
advmod(compared-14, at-11)
dep(at-11, home-12)
advmod(compared-14, as-13)
dep(do-10, compared-14)
aux(say-16, to-15)
xcomp(compared-14, say-16)

    (NP (NNP Laksa))

      (WHADVP (WRB where))

            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB prepare)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT a) (JJ whole) (NN list))
                  (PP (IN of)
                    (NP (NNS ingredients))))))))))
    (. .)))

        (NP
          (NP (DT a) (NN crispy))

            (JJ juicy)))))
    (, ,)))

    (. !)))

  (S

    (ADVP (RB only))
    (VP (VBZ takes)
      (NP (DT a) (JJ few) (NNS minutes)))
    (. .)))


det(process-2, The-1)
nsubj(takes-4, process-2)
advmod(takes-4, only-3)
root(ROOT-0, takes-4)
det(minutes-7, a-5)
amod(minutes-7, few-6)
dobj(takes-4, minutes-7)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (NP (CD 6))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, 6-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Always))
    (VP (VBP rest)
      (NP (DT the) (NN meat))
      (PP (IN before)
        (S
          (VP (VBG cutting)
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB allow)
                  (S
                    (NP (DT the) (NNS juices))
                    (VP (TO to)
                      (VP (VB be)
                        (VP (VBN reabsorbed)
                          (PP (IN into)
                            (NP (DT the) (NN meat))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(rest-2, Always-1)
root(ROOT-0, rest-2)
det(meat-4, the-3)
dobj(rest-2, meat-4)
prep(rest-2, before-5)
pcomp(before-5, cutting-6)
aux(allow-8, to-7)
xcomp(cutting-6, allow-8)
det(juices-10, the-9)
nsubjpass(reabsorbed-13, juices-10)
aux(reabsorbed-13, to-11)
auxpass(reabsorbed-13, be-12)
xcomp(allow-8, reabsorbed-13)
prep(reabsorbed-13, into-14)
det(meat-16, the-15)
pobj(into-14, meat-16)

            (VP (VB be)
              (NP

                  (ADJP (RBS most) (JJ useful)))
                (PP (IN for)
                  (S
                    (VP (VBG scraping)
                      (PRT (RP off))
                      (NP (DT the) (VBN charred) (NNS bits)))))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (PRP It))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (ADJP (JJ important)
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB make)
                (ADJP (JJ sure))
                (SBAR (IN that)
                  (S
                    (NP (DT the) (JJ entire) (NN surface))
                    (VP (VBZ has)
                      (VP (VBN blistered)))))))))))
    (CC or)
    (S
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (MD will)
        (VP (VB have)
          (NP
            (NP (NNS bits))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (NN pork) (NN skin)))
            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WDT which))
              (S
                (VP (VBZ is)
                  (ADVP (RB still))
                  (ADJP (JJ chewy)))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(important-3, It-1)
cop(important-3, is-2)
root(ROOT-0, important-3)
aux(make-5, to-4)
xcomp(important-3, make-5)
acomp(make-5, sure-6)
mark(blistered-12, that-7)
det(surface-10, the-8)
amod(surface-10, entire-9)
nsubj(blistered-12, surface-10)
aux(blistered-12, has-11)
ccomp(make-5, blistered-12)
cc(important-3, or-13)
nsubj(have-16, you-14)
aux(have-16, will-15)
conj(important-3, have-16)
dobj(have-16, bits-17)
prep(bits-17, of-18)
nn(skin-20, pork-19)
pobj(of-18, skin-20)
nsubj(chewy-24, which-21)
cop(chewy-24, is-22)
advmod(chewy-24, still-23)
rcmod(bits-17, chewy-24)

      (NP (DT The) (NN pork))
      (PP (IN in)

    (, ,)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (VBP do) (RB n't)
      (VP (VB have)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB char)
              (NP (PRP it))
              (ADVP (DT this) (RB much))
              (ADVP (RB really)))))))
    (, ,)))

aux(have-4, do-2)
neg(have-4, n't-3)

      (SBAR (IN that)

          (VP (VBZ is)
            (VP (VBN blistered))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP wish)
      (NP (PRP you))
      (NP
        (NP (NN success))
        (PP (IN with)
          (NP (PRP$ your) (NNP Sio) (NNP Bak)))))
    (. !)))

nn(Bak-8, Sio-7)
pobj(with-5, Bak-8)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Do))
    (VP (VBP write)
      (PRT (RP in))
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB let)
            (S
              (NP (PRP us))
              (VP (VB know)
                (SBAR
                  (WHADVP (WRB how))
                  (S
                    (NP (PRP$ yours))
                    (VP (VBD went))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(write-2, Do-1)
root(ROOT-0, write-2)
prt(write-2, in-3)
aux(let-5, to-4)
xcomp(write-2, let-5)
nsubj(know-7, us-6)
ccomp(let-5, know-7)
advmod(went-10, how-8)
nsubj(went-10, yours-9)
ccomp(know-7, went-10)
